title: Capulin Volcano National Monument: Donate
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Donate            Donate       THANK YOU! The public supports the parks with money from taxes and park fees and purchases in our bookstores. Visitors support us with time and labor when they volunteer or just pick up some trash during their visit. We appreciate all your support. Capulin Volcano National Monument will gratefully accept your direct donation. A donation box is available at the park in the Visitor Center or you may mail a check or money order to the park. Donations are used to fund interpretation, visitor services and safety, and resource management projects. Make checks payable to "National Park Service" and mail to:  Peter Armato, Superintendent Capulin Volcano National Monument P.O. Box 40 Des Moines, NM 88418 Thank you for supporting your national parks.
